author: elecharny
msg: Reverted the previous change : we can't get rid of the registries here, this is the place where we modify an existing SchemaManager by changing a copy of its internal Registries. Trying to modify the SchemaManager instead will lead to very painful potential schema breakage !

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Move init code for WiringReplicator out of Bridge into ha::Backup.
